portfolio:
This is my portfolio page! Initially I just wanted to make something where I could keep track of my own projects, skill progression,etc. Although as the project progressed I realised It would be a good starting point to build a portfolio page on. 

 I took this opportunity to display my web development and design skills for a portfolio, most portfolios I see seem to be overloaded with interactivity and cluttered npm packages, I wanted to keep it relatively simple and readable. While there is always a time and a place for fancy packages I feel theyâ€™re often overused when a more simple system can be used to achieve the same goal. 

 For the development of this page I used React, typescript and styled a vast majority of the components myself.
